Package nl.naturalis.nda.elasticsearch.client

Utility library providing a simple, high-level API for interacting with ElasticSearch.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IndexManager
    Interface defining a simple API for common operations on an ElasticSearch index.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IndexManagerNative
    An implementation of IndexManager that uses ElasticSearch's Native Java client.
    IndexManagerREST Deprecated
    IndexRequestFailure
    Provides information about an index request failure.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BulkIndexException
    A BulkIndexException is thrown if some of the objects in a bulk index request failed to get indexed.
    IndexManagerException
    Generic runtime exception thrown by the index managers.

Package nl.naturalis.nda.elasticsearch.client Description

Utility library providing a simple, high-level API for interacting with ElasticSearch. The other packages use this library, rather than calling the ElasticSearch Java API directly. This library is in fact not specific to the NBA import although it currently still has a dependency on the Registry class to get hold of SLF4J loggers.
